author: jm
msg: revert to using old corpus-hourly; the new script still has bugs, breaking '.all' report generation for the ruleqa system, and I don't have the time to fix them just yet

author: danielf
msg: Added Spring-OSGi configuration files that publish some of the beans from cocoon-store-impl and cocoon-xml-resolver as OSGi services. Also modified their poms to hide their implementation packages. For cocoon-xml-impl the impl package is exported again as it is used by the cocoon-xml-resolver. Needed to make the formating of the Include-Packages section less readable as it generated a faulty manifest.mf after having added one element to it. No idea why it behaved like this :/
